name: ZOOM (itch) (Jiahui (Tino) Hu, yang201003)
description:
ZOOM is a puzzle game about surveillance in a 1980s dystopian nation in Western Europe. You, as a security officer working for the government, must report unfavorable behaviours according to government directives.

The game would take 2-3 minutes to play and has 2 endings. This is a course collaborative game project at MA Games Design, London College of Communication, University of the Arts London.

Authors: Jiahui Hu, Yiting Lu, Yujie Fan, Zhizhou Yang. Special Thanks to David King, Josh Summerfield, and Riham Mansour.
